GV03sb_01_u:2183: dadhāti yatro eva samiddhatam manyeta tadāhutīrjuhuyātsamiddhahomena hyeva
GV03sb_01_u:2186: sa vā ṛcamanūcya juṣāṇena yajati | tasmādime asthantsatyanasthike cakṣuṣī āśliṣṭe
GV03sb_01_u:2187: atha yadṛcamanūcyarcā yajedasthi haiva kuryānna cakṣuḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2189: te vā ete | agnīṣomayoreva rūpamanvāyatte yacuklaṃ tadāgneyaṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2190: tatsaumyaṃ yadi vetarathā yadeva kṛṣṇaṃ tadāgneyaṃ yacuklaṃ tatsaumyaṃ yadeva
GV03sb_01_u:2191: vīkṣate tadāgneyaṃ rūpaṃ śuṣke iva hi vīkṣamāṇasyākṣiṇī bhavataḥ śuṣkamiva
GV03sb_01_u:2192: hyāgneyaṃyadeva svapiti tatsaumyaṃ rūpamārdre iva hi suṣupuṣo 'kṣiṇī bhavata
GV03sb_01_u:2193: ārdra iva hi soma ājarasaṃ ha vā asmiṃ loke cakṣuṣmānbhavati
GV03sb_01_u:2194: sacakṣuramuṣmiṃloke sambhavati ya evametau cakṣuṣī ājyabhāgau veda
GV03sb_01_u:2196: indro ha yatra vṛtrāya vajram prajahāra | so 'balīyānmanyamāno nāstṛṣītīva
GV03sb_01_u:2197: bibhyannilayāṃ cakre sa parāḥ parāvato jagāma devā ha vai vidāṃ cakrurhato vai
GV03sb_01_u:2200: tamanveṣṭuṃ dadhrire | agnirdevatānāṃ hiraṇyastūpa ṛṣīṇām bṛhatī candasāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2201: tamagniranuviveda tenaitāṃ rātriṃ sahājagāma sa vai devānāṃ vasurvīro hyeṣām
GV03sb_01_u:2203: te devā abruvan | amā vai no 'dya vasurvasati yo naḥ prāvātsīditi tābhyāmetadyathā
GV03sb_01_u:2204: jñātibhyāṃ vā sakhibhyāṃ vā sahāgatābhyāṃ samānamodanam pacedajaṃ vā tadaha
GV03sb_01_u:2206: dvādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ tasmādaindrāgno dvādaśakapālaṃ puroḍāśo bhavati
GV03sb_01_u:2208: sa indro 'bravīt | yatra vai vṛtrāya vajram prāharaṃ tadvyasmaye sa kṛśa ivāsmi na
GV03sb_01_u:2209: vai medaṃ dhinoti yanmā dhinavattanme kuruteti tatheti devā abruvan
GV03sb_01_u:2211: te devā abruvan | na vā imamanyatsomāddhinuyātsomamevāsmai sambharāmeti
GV03sb_01_u:2212: tasmai somaṃ samabharanneṣa vai somo rājā devānāmannaṃ yaccandramāḥ sa
GV03sb_01_u:2213: yatraiṣa etāṃ rātriṃ na purastānna paścāddadṛśe tadimaṃ lokamāgacati sa
GV03sb_01_u:2214: ihaivāpaścauṣadhīśca praviśati sa vai devānāṃ vasvannaṃ hyeṣāṃ tadyadeṣa etāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2220: so 'bravīt | dhinotyeva medaṃ neva tu mayi śrayate yathedam mayi śrayātai
GV03sb_01_u:2223: tadvā etat samānameva satpaya eva sadindrasyaiva sattatpunarnānevācakṣate
GV03sb_01_u:2226: sa yathāṃśurāpyāyet | evamāpyāyatāpa pāpmānaṃ harimāṇamahataiṣa u āmāvāsyasā
GV03sb_01_u:2227: bandhuḥ sa yo haivaṃ vidvāntsaṃnayatyevaṃ haiva prajayā paśubhirāpyāyate 'pa
GV03sb_01_u:2233: tadu sameva nayet | nanvatrāntareṇa śuśruma somena nu mā yājayatātha ma
GV03sb_01_u:2234: etadāpyāyanaṃ saṃbhariṣyathetyabravīditi na vai medaṃ dhinoti yanmā
GV03sb_01_u:2238: vārtraghnaṃ vai paurṇamāsam | indro hyetena vṛtramahannathaitadeva vṛtrahatyaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2241: tadvā etadeva vārtraghnam | yatpaurṇamāsamathaiṣa eva vṛtro yaccandramāḥ sa
GV03sb_01_u:2242: yatraiṣa etāṃ rātriṃ na purastānna paścāddadṛśe tadenametena sarvaṃ hanti nāsya
GV03sb_01_u:2243: kiṃ cana pariśinaṣṭi sarvaṃ ha vai pāpmānaṃ hanti na pāpmanaḥ kiṃ cana
GV03sb_01_u:2246: taddhaike | dṛṣṭvopavasanti śvo nodetetyado haiva devānāmavikṣīṇamannam
GV03sb_01_u:2247: bhavatyathaibhyo vayamita upapradāsyāma iti taddhi samṛddhaṃ yadakṣīṇa eva
GV03sb_01_u:2248: pūrvasminnanne 'thāparamannamāgacati sa ha bahvanna eva bhavatyasomayājī tu
GV03sb_01_u:2251: atha yathaiva purā | kevalīroṣadhīraśnanti kevalīrapaḥ pibanti tāḥ kevalameva payo
GV03sb_01_u:2252: duhra eva tadeṣa vai somo rājā devānāmannaṃ yaccandramāḥ sa yatraiṣa etāṃ rātriṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2253: na purastānna paścāddadṛśe tadimaṃ lokamāgacati sa ihāpaścauṣadhīśca praviśati
GV03sb_01_u:2254: tadenamadbhya oṣadhibhyaḥ saṃbhṛtyāhutibhyo 'dhi janayati sa eṣa āhutibhyo jātaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2257: tadvā etat | avikṣīṇameva devānāmannādyam pariplavate 'vikṣīṇaṃ ha vā
GV03sb_01_u:2260: tadvā etāṃ rātrim | devebhyo 'nnādyam pracyavate tadimaṃ lokamāgacati te devā
GV03sb_01_u:2261: akāmayanta kathaṃ nu na idam punarāgacetkathaṃ na idam parāgeva na praṇaśyediti
GV03sb_01_u:2262: tadya eva saṃnayanti teṣvāśaṃsanta eta eva naḥ saṃbhṛtya pradāsyantītyā ha vā
GV03sb_01_u:2263: asmintsva!śca niṣṭyāśca śaṃsante ya evametadveda yo vai paramatāṃ gacati
GV03sb_01_u:2266: tadvā eṣa evendraḥ | ya eṣa tapatyathaiṣa eva vṛtro yaccandramāḥ mo 'syaiṣa
GV03sb_01_u:2270: taṃ grasitvodeti | sa na purastānna paścāddadṛśe grasate ha vai dviṣantam
GV03sb_01_u:2273: taṃ nirdhīya nirasyati | sa eṣa dhītaḥ paścāddadṛśe sa punarāpyāyate sa
GV03sb_01_u:2274: etasyaivānnādyāya punarāpyāyate yadi ha vā asya dviṣanbhrātṛvyo vaṇijyayā vā
GV03sb_01_u:2275: kenacidvā sambhavatyetasya haivānnādyāya punaḥ sambhavati ya evametadveda
GV03sb_01_u:2277: taddhaike | mahendrāyeti kurvantīndro vā eṣa purā vṛtrasya vadhādatha vṛtraṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2278: hatvā yathā mahārājo vijigyāna evam mahendro 'bhavattasmānmahendrāyeti
GV03sb_01_u:2279: tadvindrāye=tyeva kuryādindro vā eṣa purā vṛtrasya vadhādindro vṛtraṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2282: sa vai parṇaśākhayā vatsānapākaroti | tadyatparṇaśākhayā vatsānapākaroti yatra vai
GV03sb_01_u:2283: gāyatrī somamacāpatattadasyā āharantyā apādastābhyāyatya parṇam praciceda
GV03sb_01_u:2284: gāyatryai vā somasya vā rājñastatpatitvā parṇo 'bhavattasmātparṇo nāma tadyadevātra
GV03sb_01_u:2287: tamācinatti | iṣe tvorje tveti vṛṣṭyai tadāha yadāheṣe tvetyūrje tveti yo
GV03sb_01_u:2290: atha mātṛbhirvatsāntsamavārjanti | sa vatsaṃ śākhayopaspṛśati vāyava sthetyayaṃ vai
GV03sb_01_u:2291: vāyuryo 'yam pavata eṣa vā idaṃ sarvam prapyāyati yadidaṃ kiṃ ca varṣatyeṣa vā
GV03sb_01_u:2292: etāsām prapyāyayitā tasmādāha vāyava sthetyupāyava sthetyu haika āhurūpa hi
GV03sb_01_u:2295: atha mātṛṇāmekāṃ śākhayopaspṛśati | vatsena vyākṛtya devo vaḥ savitā prārpayatviti
GV03sb_01_u:2296: savitā vai devānām prasavitā savitṛprasūtā yajñaṃ sambharāniti tasmādāha devo vaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2299: śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇa iti | yajño vai śreṣṭhatamaṃ karma yajñāya hi tasmādāha
GV03sb_01_u:2306: prajāvatīranamīvā ayakṣmā iti | nātra tirohitamivāsti mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsa
GV03sb_01_u:2307: iti mā vo nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsīśatetyevaitadāha dhruvā asmingopatau syāta
GV03sb_01_u:2310: athāhavanīyāgārasya vā purastāt | gārhapatyāgārasya vā śākhāmupagūhati
GV03sb_01_u:2313: tasyām pavitraṃ karoti | vasoḥ pavitramasīti yajño vai vasustasmādāha vasoḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2316: atha yavāgvaitāṃ rātrimagnihotraṃ juhoti | ādiṣṭaṃ vā etaddevatāyai havirbhavati
GV03sb_01_u:2317: yatpayaḥ sa yatpayasā juhuyādyathānyasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ tadanyasyai
GV03sb_01_u:2323: dyaurasi pṛthivyasīti mātariśvano gharmo 'sīti yajñamevaitatkaroti yathā gharmam
GV03sb_01_u:2324: pravṛñjyādevam pravṛṇakti viśvadhā asi parameṇa dhāmnā dṛṃhasva mā hvāriti
GV03sb_01_u:2325: dṛṃhatyevaināmetadaśithilāṃ karoti mā te yajñapatirhvārṣīditi yajamāno vai
GV03sb_01_u:2328: atha pavitraṃ nidadhati | tadvai prāṅnidadhyātprācī hi devānāṃ digatho udagudīcī hi
GV03sb_01_u:2329: manuṣyāṇāṃ digayaṃ vai pavitraṃ yo 'yam pavate so
GV03sb_01_u:2336: tannidadhāti | vasoḥ pavitramasīti yajño vai vasustasmādāha vasoḥ pavitramasīti
GV03sb_01_u:2340: atha vācaṃyamo bhavati ā tisṛṇāṃ dogdhorvāgvai yajño 'vikṣubdho yajñaṃ tanavā iti
GV03sb_01_u:2342: tadānīyamānamabhimantrayate | devastvā savitā punātu vasoḥ pavitreṇa śatadhāreṇa
GV03sb_01_u:2346: athāha kāmadhukṣa iti amūmiti sā viśvāyurityatha dvitīyām pṛcati kāmadhukṣa
GV03sb_01_u:2347: ityamūmiti sā viśvakarmetyatha tṛtīyām pṛcati kāmadhukṣa ityamūmiti sā viśvadhāyā
GV03sb_01_u:2348: iti tadyatpṛcati vīryāṇyevāsvetaddadhāti tisro dogdhi trayo vā ime lokā ebhya
GV03sb_01_u:2351: athottamāṃ dohayitvā | yena dohayati pātreṇa tasminnudastokamānīya palyaṅya
GV03sb_01_u:2352: pratyānayati yadatra payaso 'hāyi tadihāpyasaditi rasasyo caiva sarvatvāyedaṃ hi yadā
GV03sb_01_u:2353: varṣatyathauṣadhayo jāyanta oṣadhīrjagdhvāpaḥ pītvā tata eṣa rasaḥ sambhavati
GV03sb_01_u:2357: ātanakti | indrasya tvā bhāgaṃ somenātanacmīti tadyathaivādo devatāyai
GV03sb_01_u:2365: so 'pidadhāti | viṣṇo havyaṃ rakṣeti yajño vai viṣṇustadyajñāyaivaitaddhaviḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2366: paridadāti guptyai tasmādāha viṣṇo havyaṃ rakṣeti
GV03sb_01_u:2368: ṛṇaṃ ha vai jāyate yo 'sti | sa jāyamāna eva devebhya ṛṣibhyaḥ pitṛbhyo
GV03sb_01_u:2371: sa yadeva yajeta | tena devebhya ṛṇaṃ jāyate taddhyebhya etatkaroti yadenānyajate
GV03sb_01_u:2374: atha yadevānubruvīta | tena 'rṣibhya ṛṇaṃ jāyate taddhyebhya etatkarotyṛṣīṇāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2377: atha yadeva prajāmiceta | tena pitṛbhya ṛṇaṃ jāyate taddhyebhya etatkaroti yadeṣāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2380: atha yadeva vāsayate | tena manuṣyebhya ṛṇaṃ jāyate taddhyebhya etatkaroti
GV03sb_01_u:2381: yadenānvāsayate yadebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti sa ya etāni sarvāṇi karoti sa kṛtakarmā tasya
GV03sb_01_u:2384: sa yena devebhya ṛṇaṃ jāyate | tadenāṃstadavadayate yadyajate 'tha yadagnau juhoti
GV03sb_01_u:2385: tadenāṃstadavadayate tasmādyatkiṃ cāgnau juhvati tadavadānaṃ nāma
GV03sb_01_u:2387: tadvai caturavattam bhavati | idaṃ vā anuvākyātha yājyātha vaṣaṭkāro 'tha sā devatā
GV03sb_01_u:2388: caturthī yasyai devatāyai havirbhavatyevaṃ hi devatā avadānānyanvāyattā avadānāni
GV03sb_01_u:2389: vā devatā anvāyattānyatiriktaṃ ha tadavadānaṃ yatpañcamaṃ kasmā u hi
GV03sb_01_u:2392: uto pañcāvattameva bhavati | pāṅkto yajñaṃ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2393: saṃvatsarasyaiṣo pañcāvattasya sampadbahurhaiva prajayā paśubhirbhavati yasyaivaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2394: viduṣaḥ pañcāvattaṃ kriyata etaddha nveva prajñātaṃ kaurupāñcālaṃ yaccaturavattaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2397: sa vai yāvanmātramivaivāvadyet mānuṣaṃ ha kuryādyanmahadavadyedvyṛddhaṃ vai
GV03sb_01_u:2401: sa ājyasyopastīrya | dvirhaviṣo 'vadāyāthopariṣṭādājyasyābhighārayati dve vā āhutī
GV03sb_01_u:2404: tasmādubhayata ājyam bhavatyetadvai juṣṭaṃ devānāṃ yadājyaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2407: asau vā anuvākyeyaṃ yājyā | te ubhe yoṣe tayormithunamasti vaṣaṭkāra eva tadvā
GV03sb_01_u:2408: eṣa eva vaṣaṭkāro ya eṣa tapati sa udyannevāmūmādhedravatyastaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2409: yannimāmadhidravati tadetena vṛṣṇemām prajātim prajāyete yainayoriyam prajātiḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2411: so 'nuvākyāmanūcya | yājyāmanudrutya paścādvaṣaṭkaroti paścādvai parītya vṛṣā
GV03sb_01_u:2412: yoṣāmadhidravati tadene ubhe purastātkṛtvā vṛṣṇā vaṣaṭkāreṇādhidrāvayati tasmādu
GV03sb_01_u:2415: devapātraṃ vā eṣa yadvaṣaṭkāraḥ | tadyathā pātra uddhṛtya prayacedevaṃ tadatha
GV03sb_01_u:2416: yatpurā vaṣaṭkārājjuhuyādyathādho bhūmau nidigdhaṃ tadamuyā syādevaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2417: tattasmādu saha vaiva vaṣaṭkāreṇa juhuyādvaṣaṭkṛte vā
GV03sb_01_u:2419: tadyathā yonau retaḥ siñcet | evaṃ tadatha yatpurā vaṣaṭkārājjuhuyādyathā yonau
GV03sb_01_u:2420: retaḥ siktaṃ tadamuyā syādevaṃ tattasmādu saha vaiva vaṣaṭkāreṇa
GV03sb_01_u:2423: asau vā anavākyeyaṃ yājyā | sā vai gāyatrīyaṃ triṣṭubasau sa vai gāyatrīmanvāha
GV03sb_01_u:2426: atha triṣṭubhā yajati | tadanayā yajanniyaṃ hi yājyāmuṣyā adhi vaṣaṭkarotyasā u hi
GV03sb_01_u:2427: triṣṭuptadene sayujau karoti tasmādime sambhuñjāte anayoranu sambhogamimāḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2430: sa vā aṅkhayannivaivānuvākyāmanubrūyāt | asau hyanuvākyā bṛhaddhyasau bārhataṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2431: hi tadrūpaṃ kṣipra eva yājyayā tvareteyaṃ hi yājyā rathantaraṃ hīyaṃ rāthantaraṃ hi
GV03sb_01_u:2432: tadrūpaṃ hvayati vā anuvākyayā prayacati yājyayā tasmādanuvākyāyai rūpaṃ huve
GV03sb_01_u:2433: havāmaha āgacedam barhiḥ sīdeti yaddhvayati hi tayā prayacati yājyayā
GV03sb_01_u:2434: tasmādyājyāyai rūpaṃ vīhi havirjuṣasva havirāvṛṣāya svāddhi piba preti yatpra hi
GV03sb_01_u:2437: sā yā purastāllakṣaṇā | sānuvākyā syādasau hyanuvākyā tasyā amuṣyā avastāllakṣma
GV03sb_01_u:2440: atha yopariṣṭāllakṣaṇā | sā yājyā syādiyaṃ hi yājyā tasyā asyā
GV03sb_01_u:2443: sā ha nveva samṛddhānuvākyā | yasyai prathamātpadāddevatāmabhivyāharati so eva
GV03sb_01_u:2444: samṛddhā yājyā yasyā uttamātpadāddevatāyā adhi vaṣaṭkaroti vīryaṃ vai devata
GV03sb_01_u:2445: 'rcastadubhayata evaitadvīryeṇa parigṛhya yasyai devatāyai havirbhavati tasyai
GV03sb_01_u:2448: sa vai vaugiti karoti | vāgvai vaṣaṭkāro vāgreto reta evaitatsiñcati ṣaḍityṛtavo vai
GV03sb_01_u:2449: ṣaṭtadṛtuṣvevaitadretaḥ sicyate tadṛtavo retaḥ siktamimāḥ prajāḥ prajanayanti
GV03sb_01_u:2452: devāśca vā asurāśca | ubhaye prājāpatyāḥ prajāpateḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2453: piturdāyamupeyuretāvevārdhamāsau ya evāpūryate taṃ devā upāyanyo 'pakṣīyate
GV03sb_01_u:2456: te devā akāmayanta | kathaṃ nvimamapi saṃvṛñjīmahi yo 'yamasurāṇāmiti te 'rcantaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2460: ya eṣo 'surāṇāmāsīt | yadā vā etā ubhau pariplavete atha māso bhavati māsaśaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2461: saṃvatsaraḥ sarvaṃ vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvameva taddevā asurāṇāṃ samavṛñjata
GV03sb_01_u:2465: sa yo devānāmāsīt | sa yavāyuvata hi tena devā yo 'surāṇāṃ so 'yavā na hi tenāsurā
GV03sb_01_u:2468: atho itarathāhuḥ ya eva devānāmāsītso 'yavā na hi tamasurā ayuvata yo 'surāṇāṃ sa
GV03sb_01_u:2469: yavāyuvata hi taṃ devāḥ sabdamahaḥ sagarā rātriryavyā māsāḥ sumekaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2470: sveko ha vai nāmaitadyatsumeka iti yavā ca hi vā ayavā yavetīvātha yenaiteṣāṃ hotā
GV03sb_01_u:2473: yajñena vai devāḥ | divamupodakrāmannatha yo 'yaṃ devaḥ paśūnāmīṣṭe sa
GV03sb_01_u:2476: sa yenaiva devā divamupodakrāman | teno evārcantaḥ śrāmyantaśceruratha yo 'yaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2479: sa aikṣata | ahāsya hāntaryantyu mā yajñāditi so 'nūccakrāma sa āyatayottarata
GV03sb_01_u:2482: te devā abruvan | mā visrakṣīriti te vai mā yajñānmāntargatāhutim me kalpayateti
GV03sb_01_u:2483: tatheti sa samabṛhatsa nāsyatsa na kaṃ canāhinat
GV03sb_01_u:2485: te devā abruvan | yāvanti no havīṃṣi gṛhītānyabhūvantsarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2493: ityāhurvāstu hi tadyajñasya yaddhuteṣu haviḥṣu tasmādyasyai kasyai ca devatāyai
GV03sb_01_u:2494: havirgṛhyate sarvatraiva sviṣṭakṛdanvābhaktaḥ sarvatra hyevainaṃ devā anvābhajan

GV03sb_01_u:2785: nedvyṛddhaṃ yajñe karavāṇīti tasmānna nāma gṛhṇāti
GV03sb_01_u:2787: uttarasyāṃ devayajyāyāmupahūta iti | tadasmā etajjīvātumeva paro 'kṣamāśāste
GV03sb_01_u:2790: tadasmā etatprajāmeva paro 'kṣamāśāste | yasya hi prajā bhavatyamuṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2793: tadasmā etatpaśūneva paro 'kṣamāśāste yasya hi paśavo bhavanti sa
GV03sb_01_u:2796: bhūyasi haviṣkaraṇa upahūta iti | tadasmā etajjīvātumeva paro 'kṣamāśāste jīvanhi
GV03sb_01_u:2799: tadasmā etatprajāmeva paro 'kṣamāśāste yasya hi prajā bhavatyeka ātmanā
GV03sb_01_u:2800: bhavatyathota daśadhā prajayā haviṣkriyate tasmātprajā bhūyo haviṣkaraṇam
GV03sb_01_u:2802: tadasmā etatpaśūneva paro 'kṣamāśāste | yasya hi paśavo bhavanti sa
GV03sb_01_u:2805: eṣā vā āśīḥ jīveyam prajā me syācriyaṃ gaceyamiti tadyatpaśūnāśāste tacriyamāśāste
GV03sb_01_u:2806: śrīrhi paśavastadetābhyāmevaitadāśīrbhyāṃ sarvamāptaṃ tasmādvā ete atra dve
GV03sb_01_u:2809: devā ma idaṃ havirjuṣantāmiti | tasminnupahūta iti
GV03sb_01_u:2810: tadyajñasyaivaitatsamṛddhimāśāste yaddhi devā havirjuṣante tena hi mahajjayati
GV03sb_01_u:2813: tāṃ vai prāśnantyeva | nāgnau juhvati paśavo vā iḍā netpaśūnagnau pravṛṇajāmeti
GV03sb_01_u:2816: prāṇeṣveva hūyate | hotari tvadyajamāne tvadadhvaryau tvadatha yatpūrvārdham
GV03sb_01_u:2817: puroḍāśasya praśīrya purastāddhruvāyai nidadhāti yajamāno vai dhruvā
GV03sb_01_u:2818: tadyajamānasya prāśitam bhavatyatha yatpratyakṣaṃ na prāśnāti nedasaṃsthite yajñe
GV03sb_01_u:2819: prāśnānītyetadevāsya prāśitam bhavati sarve prāśnanti sarveṣu me hutāsaditi pañca
GV03sb_01_u:2820: prāśnanti paśavo vā iḍā pāṅktā vai paśavastasmātpañca prāśnanti
GV03sb_01_u:2822: atha yatra pratipadyate | taccaturdhā puroḍāśaṃ kṛtvā barhiṣadaṃ karoti tadatra
GV03sb_01_u:2823: pitṛṇāṃ bhājanena catasro vā avāntaradiśo 'vāntaradiśo vai pitarastasmāccaturdhā
GV03sb_01_u:2826: atha yatrāhopahūte dyāvāpṛthivī iti | tadagnīdha ādadhāti tadagnītprāśnātyupahūtā
GV03sb_01_u:2827: pṛthivī mātopa mām pṛthivī mātā hvayatāmagnirāgnīdhrātsvāhopahūto dyauṣpitopa
GV03sb_01_u:2828: māṃ dyauṣpitā hvayatāmagnirāgnīdhrātsvāheti dyāvāpṛthivyo vā eṣa
GV03sb_01_u:2831: atha yatrāśiṣamāśāste | tajjapati mayīdamindra indriyaṃ dadhātvasmānrāyo
GV03sb_01_u:2832: maghavānaḥ sacantām asmākaṃ santvāśiṣaḥ satyā naḥ santvāśiṣa ityāśiṣāmevaiṣa
GV03sb_01_u:2833: pratigrahastadyā evātrartvijo yajamānāyāśiṣa āśāsate tā evaitatpratigṛhyātmankurute
GV03sb_01_u:2835: atha pavitrayormārjayante | pākayajñiyayeva vā etadiḍayācāriṣuḥ pavitrapūtā yadata
GV03sb_01_u:2838: atha te pavitre prastare 'pisṛjati | yajamāno vai prastaraḥ prāṇodānau pavitre
GV03sb_01_u:2839: yajamāne tatprāṇodānau dadhāti tasmātte pavitre prastare 'pisṛjati
GV03sb_01_u:2841: te vā ete ulmuke udūhanti | anuyājebhyo yātayāmeva vā etadagnirbhavati devebhyo
GV03sb_01_u:2846: kurvantyayātayāmni yadata urdhvamasaṃsthitaṃ yajñasya tattanavāmā iti
GV03sb_01_u:2852: tāṃ hotānumantrayate | eṣā te agne samittayā vardhasva cā ca pyāyasva
GV03sb_01_u:2853: vardhiṣīmahi ca vayamā ca pyāsiṣīmahīti tadyathaivādaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2854: samidhyamānāyānvāhaivamevaitadanvāha tadetaddhotuḥ karma sa yadi manyeta na
GV03sb_01_u:2857: atha sammārṣṭi | yunaktyevainametadyukto yadata ūrdhvamasaṃsthitaṃ yajñasya
GV03sb_01_u:2858: tadvahāditi tasmātsammārṣṭi sakṛtsakṛtsammārṣṭi tristrirvā agre devebhyaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2859: sammṛjanti nettathā karavāma yathā devebhya iti
GV03sb_01_u:2860: tasmātsakṛtsakṛtsammārṣṭyajāmitāyai jāmi ha kuryādyattriḥ pūrvaṃ triraparaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2863: sa sammārṣṭi | agne vājajidvājaṃ tvā sasṛvāṃsaṃ vājajitaṃ sammārjmīti
GV03sb_01_u:2864: sariṣyantamiti vā agra āha sariṣyanniva hi tarhi bhavatyathātra sasṛvāṃsamiti
GV03sb_01_u:2867: athānuyājānyajati | yā vā etena yajñena devatā hvayati yābhya eṣa yajñastāyate sarvā
GV03sb_01_u:2868: vai tattā iṣṭā bhavanti tadyattāsu sarvāsviṣṭāsvathaitatpaścevānuyajati tasmādanuyājā
GV03sb_01_u:2871: atha yadanuyājānyajati | candāṃsi vā anuyājāḥ paśavo vai devānāṃ candāṃsi
GV03sb_01_u:2872: tadyathedaṃ paśavo yuktā manuṣyebhyo vahantyevaṃ candāṃsi yuktāni devebhyo
GV03sb_01_u:2873: yajñaṃ vahanti tadyatra candāṃsi devāntsamatarpayannatha candāṃsi devāḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2881: sa vai khalu barhiḥ prathamaṃ yajati | tadvai kaniṣṭhaṃ candaḥ sadgāyatrī prathamā
GV03sb_01_u:2882: candasāṃ yujyate tadu tadvīryeṇaiva yacyeno bhūtvā divaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2883: somamāharattadayathāyatham manyante yatkaniṣṭhaṃ candaḥ sadgāyatrī prathamā
GV03sb_01_u:2887: sa vai khalu barhiḥ prathamaṃ yajati | ayaṃ vai loko barhiroṣadhayo
GV03sb_01_u:2888: barhirasminnevaitalloka oṣadhīrdadhāti tā imā asmiṃloka oṣadhayaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2889: pratiṣṭhitāstadidaṃ sarvaṃ jagadasyāṃ teneyaṃ jagatī tajjagatīm prathamāmakurvan
GV03sb_01_u:2891: atha narāśaṃsaṃ dvitīyaṃ yajati | antarikṣaṃ vai narāśaṃsaḥ prajā vai narastā imā
GV03sb_01_u:2892: antarikṣamanu vāvadyamānāḥ prajāścaranti yadvai vadati śaṃsatīti vai
GV03sb_01_u:2899: devānyajetyevādhvaryurāha | devaṃ-devamiti sarveṣu hotā devānāṃ vai devāḥ santi
GV03sb_01_u:2900: candāṃsyeva paśavo hyeṣāṃ gṛhā hi paśavaḥ pratiṣṭho hi gṛhāścandāṃsi vā
GV03sb_01_u:2903: vasuvane vasudheyasyeti | devatāyā eva vaṣaṭkriyate devatāyai hūyate na vā atra
GV03sb_01_u:2904: devatāstyanuyājeṣu devam barhiriti tatra nāgnirnendro na somo devo narāśaṃsa iti
GV03sb_01_u:2905: ṛta ekaṃ cana yo vā atrāgnirgāyatrī sa nidānena
GV03sb_01_u:2907: atha yadvasuvane vasudheyasyeti yajati | agnirvai vasuvanirindro vasudheyo 'sti vai
GV03sb_01_u:2908: candasāṃ devatendrāgnī evaivamu haitaddevatāyā eva vaṣaṭkriyate devatāyai hūyate
GV03sb_01_u:2910: athottamamanuyājamiṣṭvā samānīya juhoti | prayājānuyājā vā ete tadyathaivādaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2911: prayājeṣu yajamānāya dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam baliṃ hārayatyattra ādyam baliṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2914: sa vai srucau vyūhati | agnīṣomayorujjitimanūjjeṣaṃ vājasya mā prasavena
GV03sb_01_u:2915: prohāmīti juhūm prācīṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇināgnīṣomau tamapanudatāṃ yo smāndveṣṭi
GV03sb_01_u:2916: yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo vājasyainaṃ prasavenāpohāmītyupabhṛtam pratīcīṃ savyena
GV03sb_01_u:2920: prasavena prohāmyagnīṣomau tamapanudatāṃ yamayaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi yaścainaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2921: dveṣṭi vājasyainam prasavenāpohāmīti paurṇamāsyāmagnīṣomīyaṃ hi paurṇamāsaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2924: athāmāvāsyāyām | indrāgnyorujjitimanūjjeṣaṃ vājasya mā prasavena prohāmīndrāgnī
GV03sb_01_u:2925: tamapanudatāṃ yo 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo vājasyainam
GV03sb_01_u:2928: yadyu adhvaryuḥ | indrāgnyorujjitimanūjjayatvayaṃ yajamāno vājasyainam prasavena
GV03sb_01_u:2929: prohāmīndrāgnī tamapanudatāṃ yamayaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi yaścainaṃ dveṣṭi
GV03sb_01_u:2933: yajamāna eva juhūmanu | yo 'smā arātīyati sa upabhṛtamanu
GV03sb_01_u:2937: tadvā etat | samāna eva karmanvyākriyate tasmādu samānādeva puruṣādattā cādyaśca
GV03sb_01_u:2938: jāyate idaṃ hi caturthe puruṣe tṛtīye saṃgacāmaha iti videvaṃ dīvyamānā jātyā āsata
GV03sb_01_u:2941: atha juhvā paridhīntsamanakti | yayā devebhyo 'hauṣīdyayā yajñaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2944: sa samanakti vasubhyastvā rudrebhyastvādityebhyastvetyete vai trayā devā yadvasavo
GV03sb_01_u:2947: atha paridhimabhipadyāśrāvayati | paridhibhyo hyetadāśrāvayati yajño vā āśrāvaṇaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2950: sa āśrāvyāha | iṣitā daivyā hotāra iti daivyā vā ete hotāro yatparidhayo 'gnayo hīṣṭā
GV03sb_01_u:2951: daivyā hotāra ityevaitadāha yadāheṣitā daivyā hotāra iti bhadravācyāyeti svayaṃ vā
GV03sb_01_u:2952: etasmai devā yuktā bhavanti yatsādhu vadeyuryatsādhu kuryustasmādāha
GV03sb_01_u:2953: bhadravācyāyeti preṣito mānuṣaḥ sūktavākāyeti tadimam mānuṣaṃ hotāraṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2956: atha prastaramādatte | yajamāno vai prastarastadyatrāsya yajño
GV03sb_01_u:2960: sa yadi vṛṣṭikāmaḥ syāt | etenaivādadīta saṃjānāthāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī iti yadā vai
GV03sb_01_u:2961: dyāvāpṛthivī saṃjānāthe atha varṣati tasmādāha saṃjānāthāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī iti
GV03sb_01_u:2962: mitrāvaruṇau tvā vṛṣṭyāvatāmiti tadyo varṣasyeṣṭe sa tvā
GV03sb_01_u:2963: vṛṣṭyāvatvityevaitadāhāyaṃ vai varṣasyeṣṭe yo 'yam pavate so 'yameka ivaiva pavate
GV03sb_01_u:2964: so 'yam puruṣe 'ntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prāñca pratyañca tāvimau prāṇodānau prāṇodānau
GV03sb_01_u:2965: vai mitrāvaruṇau tadya eva varṣasyeṣṭe sa tvā vṛṣṭyāvatvityevaitadāha
GV03sb_01_u:2966: tametenaivādadīta yadā hyeva kadā ca vṛṣṭiḥ samiva
GV03sb_01_u:2969: sa vā agraṃ juhvāmanakti | madhyamupabhṛti mūlaṃ dhruvāyāmagramiva hi
GV03sb_01_u:2972: so 'nakti | vyantu vayo 'ktaṃ rihāṇā iti vaya
GV03sb_01_u:2974: dvayaṃ tadyasmānnīcairiva haredyajamāno vai prastaro 'syā evainametatpratiṣṭhāyai
GV03sb_01_u:2977: sa harati | marutām pṛṣatīrgaceti devalokaṃ gacetyevaitadāha yadāha marutām
GV03sb_01_u:2978: pṛṣatīrgaceti vaśā pṛśnirbhūtvā divaṃ gaca tato no vṛṣṭimāvahetīyaṃ vai vaśā
GV03sb_01_u:2979: pṛśniryadidamasyām mūli cāmūlaṃ cānnādyam pratiṣṭhitaṃ teneyaṃ vaśā pṛśniriyam
GV03sb_01_u:2980: bhūtvā divaṃ gacetyevaitadāha tato no vṛṣṭimāvaheti vṛṣṭādvā ūrgrasaḥ subhūtaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2983: athaikaṃ tṛṇamapagṛhṇāti | yajamāno vai prastaraḥ sa yatkṛtsnam
GV03sb_01_u:2984: prastaramanupraharetkṣipre ha yajamāno 'muṃ lokamiyāttatho ha yajamāno
GV03sb_01_u:2991: tam prāñcamanusamasyati | prācī hi devānāṃ digatho udañcamudīcī hi manuṣyāṇāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2992: diktamaṅgulibhireva yoyupyeranna kāṣṭhairdārubhirvā itaraṃ śavaṃ vyṛṣanti
GV03sb_01_u:2993: nettathā karavāma yathetaraṃ śavamiti tasmādaṅgulibhireva yoyupyeranna
GV03sb_01_u:2997: tūṣṇīmevānuprahṛtya cakṣuṣpā agne 'si cakṣurme pāhītyātmānamupaspṛśati teno
GV03sb_01_u:3002: taṃ vai devaiḥ śrāvaya tamanubodhayetyevaitadāha śrauṣaḍiti vidurvā enamanu vā
GV03sb_01_u:3005: athāha svagā daivyā hotṛbhya iti daivyā vā ete hotāro yatparidhayo 'gnayo hi
GV03sb_01_u:3006: tānevaitatsvagākaroti tasmādāha svagā daivyā hotṛbhya iti svastirmānuṣebhya iti
GV03sb_01_u:3009: atha paridhīnanupraharati sa madhyamamevāgre paridhimanupraharati yam
GV03sb_01_u:3010: paridhiṃ paryadhatthā agne deva paṇibhirguhyamānaḥ taṃ ta etamanu joṣaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3013: atha juhūṃ copabhṛtaṃ ca sampragṛhṇāti | ado haivāhutiṃ karoti
GV03sb_01_u:3014: yadanaktyāhutirbhūtvā devalokaṃ gacāditi tasmājjuhūṃ copabhṛtaṃ ca sampragṛhṇāti
GV03sb_01_u:3016: sa vai viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ sampragṛhṇāti | yadvā anādiṣṭaṃ devatāyai havirgṛhyate
GV03sb_01_u:3017: sarvā vai tasmindevatā apitvinyo manyante na vā etatkasyai cana devatāyai
GV03sb_01_u:3021: sa sampragṛhṇāti | saṃsravabhāgā stheṣā bṛhanta iti saṃsravo hyeva khalu pariśiṣṭo
GV03sb_01_u:3022: bhavati prastareṣṭhāḥ paridheyāśca devā iti prastaraśca hi paridhayaścānuprahṛtā
GV03sb_01_u:3023: bhavantīmāṃ vācamabhi viśve gṛṇanta ityetadu vaiśvadevaṃ karotyāsadyāsminbarhiṣi
GV03sb_01_u:3024: mādayadhvaṃ svāhā vāḍiti tadyathā vaṣṭkṛtaṃ hutamevamasyaitadbhavati
GV03sb_01_u:3026: sa yasyānaso havirgṛhṇanti | anasastasya dhuri vimuñcanti yato yunajāma tato
GV03sb_01_u:3027: vimuñcāmeti yato hyeva yuñjanti tato vimuñcanti yasyo pātryai sphye tasya yato
GV03sb_01_u:3028: yunajāma tato vimuñcāmeti yato hyevaṃ yuñjanti tato vimuñcanti
GV03sb_01_u:3030: yujau ha vā ete yajñasya yatsrucau | te etadyuṅkte yatpracarati sa yaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3032: tatsādayati tadvimuñcati te etatpunaḥ prayuṅkte 'nuyājeṣu so
GV03sb_01_u:3034: prayuṅkte yatsampragṛhṇāti tadyāṃ gatimabhiyuṅkte tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā vimuñcate
GV03sb_01_u:3035: yajñaṃ vā anu prajāstasmādayam puruṣo yuṅkte 'tha vimuñcate 'tha yuṅkte tadyāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3036: gatimabhiyuṅkte tāṃ gatiṃ gatvāntato vimuñcate sa sādayati ghṛtācī stho dhuryau
GV03sb_01_u:3037: pātaṃsumne sthaḥ sumne mā dhattamiti sādhvyau sthaḥ sādhau mā
GV03sb_01_u:3040: sa yatrāha | iṣitā daivyā hotāro bhadravācyāya preṣito mānuṣaḥ sūktavākāyeti yadato
GV03sb_01_u:3041: hotānvāha sūkta iva tadāha yajamānāyaivaitadāśiṣamāśāste tadvā
GV03sb_01_u:3044: yajñaṃ vā eṣa janayati | yo yajata etena hyuktā ṛtvijastanvate taṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3045: janayantyathāśiṣamāśāste tāmasmai yajña āśiṣaṃ saṃnamayati yāmāśiṣamāśāste yo
GV03sb_01_u:3048: devānvā eṣa prīṇāti | yo yajata etena yajñenargbhiriva tvadyajurbhiriva
GV03sb_01_u:3049: tvadāhutibhiriva tvatsa devānprītvā teṣvapitvī bhavati teṣvapitvī
GV03sb_01_u:3050: bhūtvāthāśiṣamāśāste tāmasmai devā āśiṣaṃ saṃnamayanti yāmāśiṣamāśāste yo no
GV03sb_01_u:3053: atha pratipadyate | idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī bhadramabhūditi bhadraṃ hyabhūdyo yajñasya
GV03sb_01_u:3054: saṃsthāmagannārdhma sūktavākamuta namovākamityubhayaṃ vā etadyajña eva
GV03sb_01_u:3061: śaṃgavī jīvadānū iti | śaṃgavī te jīvadānū stāmityevaitadāhātrasnū apravede iti māha
GV03sb_01_u:3062: kasmāccana pratrāsīrmo ta idam puṣṭaṃ kaścana pravidatetyevaitadāha
GV03sb_01_u:3064: urugavyūtī abhayaṃkṛtāviti | urugayūtī te 'bhaye stāmityevaitadāha vṛṣṭidyāvā
GV03sb_01_u:3067: śambhuvau mayobhuvāviti | śambhuvau te mayobhuvau stāmityevaitadāhorjasvatī ca
GV03sb_01_u:3068: payasvatī ceti rasavatyau ta upajīvanīye stāmityevaitadāha
GV03sb_01_u:3070: sūpacaraṇā ca svadhicaraṇāceti | sūpacaraṇāha te 'sāvastu yāmadhastādupacarasi
GV03sb_01_u:3074: agniridaṃ haviḥ ajuṣatāvīvṛdhata maho jyāyo 'kṛteti tadāgneyamājyabhāgamāha
GV03sb_01_u:3077: eṣa ubhayatrācyuta āgneyaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati tamāha
GV03sb_01_u:3079: atha yathādevataṃ | devā ājyapā ājyamajuṣantāvīvṛdhanta maho jyāyo 'krateti
GV03sb_01_u:3080: tatprayājānuyājānāha prayājānuyājā vai devā ājyapā agnirhotreṇedaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3081: havirajuṣatāvīvṛdhata maho jyāyo 'kṛteti tadagniṃ hotreṇāhājuṣatetyevaṃ yā iṣṭā
GV03sb_01_u:3082: devatā bhavanti tāḥ sampaśyatyasau havirajuṣatāsau havirajuṣateti
GV03sb_01_u:3083: tadyajñasyaivaitatsamṛddhimāśāste yaddhi devā havirjuṣante tena hi mahajjayati
GV03sb_01_u:3084: tasmādāhājuṣatetyavīvṛdhateti yadvai devā havirjoṣayante tadapi girimātraṃ kurvate
GV03sb_01_u:3087: maho jyāyo 'krateti | yajño vai devānām mahastaṃ hyetajjyāyāṃsamiva kurvate
GV03sb_01_u:3094: dīrghāyutvamāśāsta iti | sā yāmutrottarā devayajyā tadiha pratyakṣṃ dīrghāyutvam

GV03sb_01_u:3382: atha putrasya nāma gṛhṇāti | idam me 'yaṃ vīryam putro 'nusaṃtanavaditi yadi putro
GV03sb_01_u:3386: vrataṃ visṛjate | idamahaṃ ya evāsmi so 'smītyamānuṣa iva vā etadbhavati
GV03sb_01_u:3387: yadvratamupaiti na hi tadavakalpate yadbrūyādidamahaṃ satyādanṛtamupaimīti tadu
GV03sb_01_u:3388: khalu punarmānuṣo bhavati tasmādidamahaṃ ya evāsmi sā 'smītyevaṃ vrataṃ
